mapper.select: select stuno,stu_name,stu_sex,stu_class,major,phone,enter_year, date_format(birthday,'%Y-%m-%d') as birthday,address from student where stuno = #{stuno}
select stu_name from student where stuno = #{stuno}
select base_no from register where stuno = #{stuno}
select count(*) as num,major as major from register a ,student b where a.stuno = b.stuno group by major
select count(*) as num,base_name as base_name from register a ,base b ,student c where a.base_no = b.base_no and c.stuno = a.stuno group by a.base_no
select count(*) as num,major as major,base_name as base_name from register a ,student b,base c where a.stuno = b.stuno and a.base_no = c.base_no group by b.major,a.base_no

select a.stu_name as stu_name,a.stu_class as stu_class,a.major as major, c.base_name as base_name,b.cname as cname from student a,traincourse b,base c,register d where a.stuno = d.stuno and b.cno = d.cno and c.base_no = d.base_no and b.base_no = c.base_no order by a.major,c.base_name,b.cname
